Translations.Text: Nnan uaoaben n uclue: "numen". Ini: "ur tuminem". Maca init ed: "nunez"; ur ikcim ara liman ar wulawen nnwen. Ma touvam Oebbi akked Umazan iS, ur awen Isoueu acemma seg igiten nnwen. Oebbi, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Lmumnin d wid kan iumnen s Oebbi akked Umazan iS, d$a, ur pcukun. Pna$en s wayla nnsen akked yiman nnsen, deg ubrid n Oebbi. D widak ay d imawlan n tidep
Ini: "day ad aS temlem i Oebbi, ddin nnwen"? Oebbi Ieoa i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt. Oebbi Issen yal cci
Rran ak annuz nnsen, d tajmilt. Ini: "ur iyi telli tejmilt deg annuz nnwen. Xaii, d Oebbi ikwen I$aten mi kwen Inha ar liman, ma d imawlan n tidep ay tellam
Ih, Oebbi Issen tabavnit n tmurt akked igenwan. Oebbi Ipwali ayen txeddmem
S Leqwoan, mucaa
Xaii! Wehmen mi ten id iusa uneddao, segsen. Nnan ijehliyen: "ayagi d lwehma
Ma nemmut, nu$al d akal, ayagi d tu$alin si mbaid
Ni$ Neeoa aceal, segsen, i issenqes wakal. £uone£ Tazmamt ieerrzen
Xaii! Nekoen tidep, mi ten id tusa, d$a terwi leala nnsen
Day ur muqlen ara igenni, sennig sen, amek i t Nebna? Ncebbee it, ur isai i$isan
Tamurt, Nvelq ip, Nerra degs idurar, Nessem$i d degs tayuga n yal uuenf amxallef
i tmu$li akked usmekti n yal amdan isteooiaen
Nesse$li d seg igenni aman ioqan. Nessem$i d yissen leonanat akked uaqqa n tmegra
akked tezdayin ti$wezfanin, s ijeooigen mbabben
d ooeeq i imdanen. Nessider d yissen tamurt immuten. Akka tanekra
Inkeo, uqbel nnsen, ugdud n Nue, At Rrass, Tamud
Aad, Feraun, atmaten n Lui
At Laika, akked ugdud n Tubbaa. Nekoen akw imazanen. Iuao ussigwed iW
Day £ issefcel uxlaq amezwaru? Wanag nitni di ccekk $ef uxlaq amaynut
Ni$ Nxelq ed amdan. Neeoa s wacu i t t$ewwu, teowiet is. Neqoeb $uoes, sennig ieuoan n temgaot is
Mara iifen wid ippaiiafen; qqimen, wa $eo yeffus, wa $eo zelmev
ur d iqqao awal, siwa ma illa $uoes, uassas imeelles
Iusa d ddux n tmeppant, ibbwi d tidep: "atan wayen iseg la treggwlev
Auuvu di lbuq. D wagi ay d ass n ussigwed
Yal iman a d ias s unehhao, akked unagi
Ni$ telliv testehzav $ef waya. Nekkes ak taduli k. Ieoi k, assa, d uzzal
Ad yini umsaaef is: "ata $uoi wayen id ippuheggan
Veggoet, ar Loahennama, yal ajehli amaaui
i iugwin lxio, amjuo, imcebbwel
i irran ar tama n Oebbi, oebbi nniven. Ihi, veggoet ep s aaaqeb uqsie
